Class Bus

extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of bus in passengers module.
    Author:
    Mikołaj Sowiński

    • Method Detail

      • arrive

        public void arrive()
        Changes state of the bus to Bus.State.ATBUSSTOP.

      • depart

        public void depart()
        Order bus to depart from the bus stop. Changes state of the bus to Bus.State.RUNNING and sets field requestedBusStop.

        Returns number of free places in the bus.

      • getNearestRequestedBusStop

        private BusStop getNearestRequestedBusStop()
        Gets nearest bus stop requested by the passengers.
        Returns:
        nearest requested BusStop

      • resetBus

        void resetBus()
        Removes all passengers from the bus (killing them!) and puts bus into Bus.State.RUNNING.
